modName: Female Vampiric Knight Conversion UNPB BBP HDT-PE
summary:
Female Vampiric Knight UNP by NewerMind43

Conversion to UNPB/UNPB BBP HDT-PE body
descriptionHtml:
Requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37000/]Female Vampiric Knight UNP by NewerMind43[/url] installed first.

Use a mod manager to install. Contains both UNBP and UNPB BBP HDT-PE

For Manual install Choose either UNPB or UNPB-BBP folders

Next select both files

torso_0.nif
torso_1.nif

Place into
Data\meshes\armor\vampiricknight\

==================================================================================================================================

Thanks to NewerMind43
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37000]Female Vampiric Knight UNP[/url]

Thanks to dimon99
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body and SFW bikini[/url]

UNPB MTM body
